title: Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa
raw_text: ===== main placeholder ========================================== Subclass 491 Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa A visa for skilled people nominated by a state or territory government to live and work in regional Australia Basic Eligibility You must: be nominated to apply by a state or territory government agency, or an eligible relative must sponsor you have an occupation on a relevant skilled occupation list have a suitable skills assessment for the occupation be invited to apply satisfy the points test. Subclass 491 Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa - Main applicant This is a provisional visa. It is for skilled workers who want to live and work in regional Australia ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​stay in Australia for 5 years live, work and study in a designated regional area of Australia travel to and from Australia as many times as you want, while the visa is valid​ apply for permanent residence after 3 years from the time your visa is granted​.​ Stay 5 Years Cost From AUD4,910.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. Details Subclass 491 Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa – Subsequent entrant This visa is for a member of the family unit of someone who holds a Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 491) ​be a member of the family unit of a person who holds a subclass 491 visa on the basis of satisfying the primary criteria for the grant of that visa. Stay Until the visa that your family member holds ends. Cost From AUD4,910.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. Details

Subclass 491

# Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa

Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa

A visa for skilled people nominated by a state or territory government to live and work in regional Australia

A visa for skilled people nominated by a state or territory government to live and work in regional Australia

### Basic Eligibility

Basic Eligibility

You must:

You must:
- be nominated to apply by a state or territory government agency, or an eligible relative must sponsor you
be nominated to apply by a state or territory government agency, or an eligible relative must sponsor you
- have an occupation on a relevantskilled occupation list
have an occupation on a relevant
skilled occupation list
- have a suitableskills assessmentfor the occupation
have a suitable
skills assessment
for the occupation
- be invited to apply
be invited to apply
- satisfy the points test.
satisfy the points test.
Subclass 491

## Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa - Main applicant

Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa - Main applicant
This is a provisional visa. It is for skilled workers who want to live and work in regional Australia
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​stay in Australia for 5 years
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​stay in Australia for 5 years
- live, work and study in a designated regional area of Australia
live, work and study in a designated regional area of Australia
- travel to and from Australia as many times as you want, while the visa is valid​
travel to and from Australia as many times as you want, while the visa is valid​
- apply for permanent residence after 3 years from the time your visa is granted​.​
apply for permanent residence after 3 years from the time your visa is granted​.​
Stay

5 Years

5 Years

Subclass 491

## Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa – Subsequent entrant

Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa – Subsequent entrant
This visa is for a member of the family unit of someone who holds a Skilled Work Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 491)
- ​be a member of the family unit of a person who holds a subclass 491 visa on the basis of satisfying the primary criteria for the grant of that visa.
​be a member of the family unit of a person who holds a subclass 491 visa on the basis of satisfying the primary criteria for the grant of that visa.
Stay

Until the visa that your family member holds ends.
